comments.content: It looks like a **[Clarendon (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221211812/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Clarendon%20Cn%20BT%20-%20Bold&fid=b879b7299d27bbe89fa07a7c1c20f3d8&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=BRKLYN&fit=1)**, further emboldened, with the /N rotated 180 deg.
